name: My Particle Limbo
description:
THIS IS NOT A GAME, this is a Tech-Demo / VFX-Showcase!

It is also my first ever released project to the public, im an beginner indie-developer and this lil project is my big debut! well... my VFX-Debut to be specific. :P

Its a 'Collection' of what i have learned so far or what i have created so far!

It features 4 Scenes (and a Menu) for you to explore, observe and play!

HUGE thanks to Gabriel Aguiar Prod!! His tutorials helped me get a solid grasp of VFX. Some VFX here are just recreations from his tutorial-videos. :P

I also want to thank Drkool for allowing me to use some of his awesome mewsic!!

The assets came from hand-crafted-models/textures and the ol' googl-images! The fish is from the tutorial series, the mannequins are mixamo-standard-models, and the hand-model on the "'Texan' Shooter" is from TF2. ;}

I hope you enjoy my lil Tech-Demo! I appreciate any kind of feedback. :D
